inapplicable.help: Elements must only use allowed ARIA attributes

inapplicable.help: ARIA dialog and alertdialog nodes should have an accessible name

inapplicable.help: ARIA progressbar nodes must have an accessible name

inapplicable.help: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

inapplicable.help: Certain ARIA roles must be contained by particular parents

inapplicable.help: aria-roledescription must be on elements with a semantic role

inapplicable.help: "role=text" should have no focusable descendants

inapplicable.help: ARIA toggle fields must have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensures every ARIA tooltip node has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: ARIA tooltip nodes must have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensures every ARIA treeitem node has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: ARIA treeitem nodes should have an accessible name

inapplicable.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid values

inapplicable.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid names

inapplicable.help: IDs of active elements must be unique

inapplicable.help: IDs used in ARIA and labels must be unique

inapplicable.help: Table header text must not be empty

inapplicable.help: Frames should be tested with axe-core

inapplicable.help: Frames should have a unique title attribute

inapplicable.help: Image buttons must have alternate text

inapplicable.help: Form elements must have labels

inapplicable.description: Flags elements whose role is none or presentation and which cause the role conflict resolution to trigger.
inapplicable.help: Elements of role none or presentation should be flagged

inapplicable.description: Ensures [role='img'] elements have alternate text
inapplicable.help: [role='img'] elements must have an alternative text

inapplicable.description: Ensures the scope attribute is used correctly on tables
inapplicable.help: scope attribute should be used correctly

inapplicable.description: Ensure elements that have scrollable content are accessible by keyboard
inapplicable.help: Scrollable region must have keyboard access

inapplicable.description: Ensures select element has an accessible name
inapplicable.help: Select element must have an accessible name

inapplicable.description: Ensures that server-side image maps are not used
inapplicable.help: Server-side image maps must not be used

inapplicable.description: Ensure all skip links have a focusable target
inapplicable.help: The skip-link target should exist and be focusable

inapplicable.description: Ensures <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text
inapplicable.help: <svg> elements with an img role must have an alternative text

inapplicable.description: Ensures tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0
inapplicable.help: Elements should not have tabindex greater than zero

inapplicable.description: Ensure the <caption> element does not contain the same text as the summary attribute
inapplicable.help: tables should not have the same summary and caption

inapplicable.description: Ensure that each cell in a table that uses the headers attribute refers only to other cells in that table
inapplicable.help: Table cells that use the headers attribute must only refer to cells in the same table

inapplicable.description: Ensure that <th> elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader have data cells they describe
inapplicable.help: Table headers in a data table must refer to data cells

inapplicable.description: Ensures lang attributes have valid values
inapplicable.help: lang attribute must have a valid value

inapplicable.description: Ensures <video> elements have captions
inapplicable.help: <video> elements must have captions

passes.description: Ensures role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
passes.help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

passes.description: Ensures aria-hidden='true' is not present on the document body.
passes.help: aria-hidden='true' must not be present on the document body

passes.description: Ensures elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes
passes.help: Required ARIA attributes must be provided

passes.description: Ensures all elements with a role attribute use a valid value
passes.help: ARIA roles used must conform to valid values

passes.description: Ensure that text spacing set through style attributes can be adjusted with custom stylesheets
passes.help: Inline text spacing must be adjustable with custom stylesheets

passes.description: Ensures buttons have discernible text
passes.help: Buttons must have discernible text

passes.description: Ensures each page has at least one mechanism for a user to bypass navigation and jump straight to the content
passes.help: Page must have means to bypass repeated blocks

passes.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA contrast ratio thresholds
passes.help: Elements must have sufficient color contrast

passes.description: Ensures each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element
passes.help: Documents must have <title> element to aid in navigation

passes.description: Ensures every id attribute value is unique
passes.help: id attribute value must be unique

passes.description: Ensures headings have discernible text
passes.help: Headings should not be empty

passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

passes.description: Ensures every HTML document has a lang attribute
passes.help: <html> element must have a lang attribute

passes.description: Ensures the lang attribute of the <html> element has a valid value
passes.help: <html> element must have a valid value for the lang attribute

passes.description: Ensure that links with the same accessible name serve a similar purpose
passes.help: Links with the same name must have a similar purpose

passes.description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation
passes.help: Images must have alternate text

passes.description: Ensure image alternative is not repeated as text
passes.help: Alternative text of images should not be repeated as text

passes.description: Ensures the banner landmark is at top level
passes.help: Banner landmark should not be contained in another landmark

passes.description: Ensures the contentinfo landmark is at top level
passes.help: Contentinfo landmark should not be contained in another landmark

passes.description: Ensures the document has at most one banner landmark
passes.help: Document should not have more than one banner landmark

passes.description: Ensures the document has at most one contentinfo landmark
passes.help: Document should not have more than one contentinfo landmark

passes.description: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination
passes.help: Ensures landmarks are unique

passes.description: Ensures links have discernible text
passes.help: Links must have discernible text

passes.description: Ensures that lists are structured correctly
passes.help: <ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements

passes.description: Ensures <li> elements are used semantically
passes.help: <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>

passes.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> can scale a significant amount
passes.help: Users should be able to zoom and scale the text up to 500%

passes.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming
passes.help: Zooming and scaling should not be disabled

passes.description: Ensures interactive controls are not nested as they are not always announced by screen readers or can cause focus problems for assistive technologies
passes.help: Interactive controls must not be nested

passes.description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
passes.help: Page should contain a level-one heading

passes.description: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks
passes.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

color-contrast.help: Elements must have sufficient color contrast

heading-order.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
heading-order.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

landmark-one-main.description: Ensures the document has a main landmark
landmark-one-main.help: Document should have one main landmark

region.description: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks
region.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

aria-allowed-role.description: Ensures role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
aria-allowed-role.help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

aria-hidden-body.description: Ensures aria-hidden='true' is not present on the document body.
aria-hidden-body.help: aria-hidden='true' must not be present on the document body

aria-required-attr.description: Ensures elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes
aria-required-attr.help: Required ARIA attributes must be provided

aria-roles.description: Ensures all elements with a role attribute use a valid value
aria-roles.help: ARIA roles used must conform to valid values

avoid-inline-spacing.description: Ensure that text spacing set through style attributes can be adjusted with custom stylesheets
avoid-inline-spacing.help: Inline text spacing must be adjustable with custom stylesheets

bypass.description: Ensures each page has at least one mechanism for a user to bypass navigation and jump straight to the content
bypass.help: Page must have means to bypass repeated blocks

color-contrast.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA contrast ratio thresholds
color-contrast.help: Elements must have sufficient color contrast

document-title.description: Ensures each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element
document-title.help: Documents must have <title> element to aid in navigation

duplicate-id.description: Ensures every id attribute value is unique
duplicate-id.help: id attribute value must be unique

heading-order.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
heading-order.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

html-has-lang.description: Ensures every HTML document has a lang attribute
html-has-lang.help: <html> element must have a lang attribute

html-lang-valid.help: <html> element must have a valid value for the lang attribute

identical-links-same-purpose.description: Ensure that links with the same accessible name serve a similar purpose
identical-links-same-purpose.help: Links with the same name must have a similar purpose

image-alt.description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation

image-redundant-alt.description: Ensure image alternative is not repeated as text
image-redundant-alt.help: Alternative text of images should not be repeated as text

landmark-banner-is-top-level.description: Ensures the banner landmark is at top level
landmark-banner-is-top-level.help: Banner landmark should not be contained in another landmark

landmark-contentinfo-is-top-level.description: Ensures the contentinfo landmark is at top level
landmark-contentinfo-is-top-level.help: Contentinfo landmark should not be contained in another landmark

landmark-no-duplicate-banner.description: Ensures the document has at most one banner landmark
landmark-no-duplicate-banner.help: Document should not have more than one banner landmark

landmark-no-duplicate-contentinfo.description: Ensures the document has at most one contentinfo landmark
landmark-no-duplicate-contentinfo.help: Document should not have more than one contentinfo landmark

landmark-unique.description: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

list.description: Ensures that lists are structured correctly
list.help: <ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements

listitem.help: <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>

meta-viewport-large.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> can scale a significant amount
meta-viewport-large.help: Users should be able to zoom and scale the text up to 500%

meta-viewport.description: Ensures <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming
meta-viewport.help: Zooming and scaling should not be disabled

nested-interactive.description: Ensures interactive controls are not nested as they are not always announced by screen readers or can cause focus problems for assistive technologies
nested-interactive.help: Interactive controls must not be nested

page-has-heading-one.description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
page-has-heading-one.help: Page should contain a level-one heading

region.description: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks
region.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

accesskeys.description: Ensures every accesskey attribute value is unique
accesskeys.help: accesskey attribute value should be unique

area-alt.description: Ensures <area> elements of image maps have alternate text
area-alt.help: Active <area> elements must have alternate text

aria-allowed-attr.description: Ensures ARIA attributes are allowed for an element's role
aria-allowed-attr.help: Elements must only use allowed ARIA attributes

aria-command-name.description: Ensures every ARIA button, link and menuitem has an accessible name
aria-command-name.help: ARIA commands must have an accessible name

aria-dialog-name.description: Ensures every ARIA dialog and alertdialog node has an accessible name
aria-dialog-name.help: ARIA dialog and alertdialog nodes should have an accessible name

aria-hidden-focus.description: Ensures aria-hidden elements are not focusable nor contain focusable elements
aria-hidden-focus.help: ARIA hidden element must not be focusable or contain focusable elements

aria-input-field-name.description: Ensures every ARIA input field has an accessible name
aria-input-field-name.help: ARIA input fields must have an accessible name

aria-meter-name.description: Ensures every ARIA meter node has an accessible name
aria-meter-name.help: ARIA meter nodes must have an accessible name

aria-progressbar-name.description: Ensures every ARIA progressbar node has an accessible name
aria-progressbar-name.help: ARIA progressbar nodes must have an accessible name

aria-required-children.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them
aria-required-children.help: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

aria-required-parent.description: Ensures elements with an ARIA role that require parent roles are contained by them
aria-required-parent.help: Certain ARIA roles must be contained by particular parents

aria-roledescription.description: Ensure aria-roledescription is only used on elements with an implicit or explicit role
aria-roledescription.help: aria-roledescription must be on elements with a semantic role

aria-text.description: Ensures "role=text" is used on elements with no focusable descendants

aria-toggle-field-name.description: Ensures every ARIA toggle field has an accessible name
aria-toggle-field-name.help: ARIA toggle fields must have an accessible name

aria-tooltip-name.description: Ensures every ARIA tooltip node has an accessible name
aria-tooltip-name.help: ARIA tooltip nodes must have an accessible name

aria-treeitem-name.description: Ensures every ARIA treeitem node has an accessible name
aria-treeitem-name.help: ARIA treeitem nodes should have an accessible name

aria-valid-attr-value.description: Ensures all ARIA attributes have valid values
aria-valid-attr-value.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid values

aria-valid-attr.description: Ensures attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes
aria-valid-attr.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid names

autocomplete-valid.description: Ensure the autocomplete attribute is correct and suitable for the form field
autocomplete-valid.help: autocomplete attribute must be used correctly

blink.help: <blink> elements are deprecated and must not be used

definition-list.help: <dl> elements must only directly contain properly-ordered <dt> and <dd> groups, <script>, <template> or <div> elements

dlitem.description: Ensures <dt> and <dd> elements are contained by a <dl>
dlitem.help: <dt> and <dd> elements must be contained by a <dl>

duplicate-id-active.description: Ensures every id attribute value of active elements is unique
duplicate-id-active.help: IDs of active elements must be unique

duplicate-id-aria.description: Ensures every id attribute value used in ARIA and in labels is unique
duplicate-id-aria.help: IDs used in ARIA and labels must be unique

empty-table-header.description: Ensures table headers have discernible text
empty-table-header.help: Table header text must not be empty

form-field-multiple-labels.description: Ensures form field does not have multiple label elements
form-field-multiple-labels.help: Form field must not have multiple label elements

frame-focusable-content.description: Ensures <frame> and <iframe> elements with focusable content do not have tabindex=-1
frame-focusable-content.help: Frames with focusable content must not have tabindex=-1

frame-tested.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain the axe-core script
frame-tested.help: Frames should be tested with axe-core

frame-title-unique.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements contain a unique title attribute
frame-title-unique.help: Frames should have a unique title attribute

frame-title.description: Ensures <iframe> and <frame> elements have an accessible name
frame-title.help: Frames must have an accessible name

html-xml-lang-mismatch.description: Ensure that HTML elements with both valid lang and xml:lang attributes agree on the base language of the page
html-xml-lang-mismatch.help: HTML elements with lang and xml:lang must have the same base language

input-button-name.description: Ensures input buttons have discernible text
input-button-name.help: Input buttons must have discernible text

input-image-alt.description: Ensures <input type="image"> elements have alternate text
input-image-alt.help: Image buttons must have alternate text

label-title-only.description: Ensures that every form element has a visible label and is not solely labeled using hidden labels, or the title or aria-describedby attributes
label-title-only.help: Form elements should have a visible label

label.description: Ensures every form element has a label

landmark-complementary-is-top-level.description: Ensures the complementary landmark or aside is at top level
landmark-complementary-is-top-level.help: Aside should not be contained in another landmark

landmark-main-is-top-level.description: Ensures the main landmark is at top level
landmark-main-is-top-level.help: Main landmark should not be contained in another landmark

landmark-no-duplicate-main.description: Ensures the document has at most one main landmark
landmark-no-duplicate-main.help: Document should not have more than one main landmark

marquee.help: <marquee> elements are deprecated and must not be used

presentation-role-conflict.description: Flags elements whose role is none or presentation and which cause the role conflict resolution to trigger.
presentation-role-conflict.help: Elements of role none or presentation should be flagged

role-img-alt.help: [role='img'] elements must have an alternative text

scope-attr-valid.description: Ensures the scope attribute is used correctly on tables
scope-attr-valid.help: scope attribute should be used correctly

scrollable-region-focusable.description: Ensure elements that have scrollable content are accessible by keyboard
scrollable-region-focusable.help: Scrollable region must have keyboard access

select-name.description: Ensures select element has an accessible name
select-name.help: Select element must have an accessible name

server-side-image-map.description: Ensures that server-side image maps are not used
server-side-image-map.help: Server-side image maps must not be used

skip-link.description: Ensure all skip links have a focusable target
skip-link.help: The skip-link target should exist and be focusable

svg-img-alt.description: Ensures <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text
svg-img-alt.help: <svg> elements with an img role must have an alternative text

tabindex.description: Ensures tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0
tabindex.help: Elements should not have tabindex greater than zero

table-duplicate-name.description: Ensure the <caption> element does not contain the same text as the summary attribute
table-duplicate-name.help: tables should not have the same summary and caption

td-headers-attr.description: Ensure that each cell in a table that uses the headers attribute refers only to other cells in that table
td-headers-attr.help: Table cells that use the headers attribute must only refer to cells in the same table

th-has-data-cells.description: Ensure that <th> elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader have data cells they describe
th-has-data-cells.help: Table headers in a data table must refer to data cells

valid-lang.description: Ensures lang attributes have valid values
valid-lang.help: lang attribute must have a valid value
